name: databricks/databricks-dolly-15k
description: Databricks-dolly-15k is an extensive open-source dataset, meticulously curated by Databricks employees, encompassing a wide range of instruction-following records across various behavioral categories as outlined in the InstructGPT paper. These categories include brainstorming, classification, closed QA, generation, information extraction, open QA, and summarization. This dataset is a valuable resource for researchers and developers, offering a diverse and realistic dataset for training and evaluating language models.
citeAs: @online{DatabricksBlog2023DollyV2,     author    = {Mike Conover and Matt Hayes and Ankit Mathur and Jianwei Xie and Jun Wan and Sam Shah and Ali Ghodsi and Patrick Wendell and Matei Zaharia and Reynold Xin},     title     = {Free Dolly: Introducing the World's First Truly Open Instruction-Tuned LLM},     year      = {2023},     url       = {https://www.databricks.com/blog/2023/04/12/dolly-first-open-commercially-viable-instruction-tuned-llm},     urldate   = {2023-06-30} }
creator: databricks
